chinese: Richard, 如果你们家的晚饭每天都像今天这么丰盛的话,
english: Richard, if your dinners are like this every night,

chinese: 那我要嫉妒死你了.
english: I'm going to be a very jealous man.

chinese: Oh, 当然啦. 有五道大菜. 还有烛光呢.
english: Oh, absolutely. Five courses. Candlelight.

chinese: Richard这个人很容易满足.
english: It is so easy to please Richard.

chinese: 不好意思, 伙计们. 我可是来过这里.
english: Sorry guys. I've been here.

chinese: 看到的可是中式快餐饭盒.
english: I've seen the Chinese food cartons.

chinese: 我告诉过你们他这个人很容易满足.
english: I told you he was easy to please.

chinese: Richard不管吃什么都很满意.
english: Any food will make Richard happy.

chinese: 你可真幸运, Nancy.
english: You're lucky, Nancy.

chinese: 我每天都做饭,
english: I cook,

chinese: 可是有一半的时候他都累得吃不下去.
english: and half the time he's too tired to eat.

chinese: 我们吃得太晚了.
english: We eat too late.

chinese: 问题是你常常要到8点钟以后才能到家呀.
english: You don't get home until 8 o'clock.

chinese: 这么说你们大家的工作时间都很长吗?
english: So you guys have been putting in a lot of hours?

chinese: 谁不是这样呢?
english: Who isn't?

chinese: 说的是啊. Well, 我买了一张彩票.
english: Really. Well, I bought a lottery ticket.

chinese: Uh-oh. 我那讲究实际的搭档是怎么了?
english: Uh-oh. What happened to my practical partner?

chinese: 要是我中奖了你们大家想要什么?
english: What do you all want when I win?

chinese: Douglas, 亲爱的, 我们俩去航海吧.
english: Douglas, honey, you and I are taking a cruise.

chinese: 我想要艘新的帆船不过分吧?
english: Is it too much to ask for a new sailboat?

chinese: 没问题, Joe.
english: You got it, Joe.

chinese: 那我也要一艘.
english: I'll have one, too.

chinese: 不，不, Richard.
english: No, no, Richard.

chinese: Yvonne应该捐一大笔钱资助你竞选.
english: Yvonne should make a big contribution to your campaign.

chinese: 不, 不, 不, 不, 不, hey... 我们还没有决定呢.
english: No, no, no, no, hey... We have not yet decided that.

chinese: 你们还没有决定什么?
english: What haven't you decided?

chinese: Richard是否要竞选首席检察官.
english: If Richard is going to run for Attorney General.

chinese: -Oh.   -Ow.
english: -Oh.   -Ow.

chinese: 真对不起. 我还不知道呢.
english: I'm sorry. I didn't know.

chinese: 我想可能是Joe太忙了, 忘了告诉我.
english: I guess Joe was too busy to tell me.

chinese: -Ow.   -对不起, 亲爱的. 是你的脚吗?
english: -Ow.   -I'm sorry dear. Was that your foot?
